abstract.p: Provided is a system of computing and rendering a nature of a chemical bond based on physical, Maxwellian solutions of charge, mass, and current density functions of hydrogen-type molecules and molecular ions. The system includes a processor for processing Maxwellian equations representing charge, mass, and current density functions of hydrogen-type molecules and molecular ions and an output device in communication with the processor for displaying the nature of the chemical bond.
